entry.title: Re @spideycyp_155 Whether one likes it or not, Crimea is absolutely seen as a core part of Russia by Russia. Crimea is also of critical national secur...
entry.summary: Re @spideycyp_155 Whether one likes it or not, Crimea is absolutely seen as a core part of Russia by Russia. Crimea is also of critical national security importance to Russia, as it is their southern navy base. From their standpoint losing Crimea is like USA losing Hawaii & Pearl Harbor.

entry.summary: Re @spideycyp_155 If Russia is faced with the choice of losing Crimea or using battlefield nukes, they will choose the latter.
